title: Safarova makes WTA Finals
text:
Source: Shanghai Daily | October 23, 2015, Friday | Print Edition 
Lucie Safarova qualified for the WTA Finals yesterday after her last rival Carla Suarez Navarro lost to a qualifier at the Kremlin Cup. 
Suarez Navarro could have qualified for the season-ending tournament in Singapore by reaching the final in Moscow but was beaten 1-6, 2-6 by Russiaâ€™s Daria Kasatkina in the quarterfinals. Czech Safarova had lost in the first round in Moscow to reigning champion Anastasia Pavlyuchenkova. Safarova joins Flavia Pennetta, Angelique Kerber, Simona Halep, Garbine Muguruza, Maria Sharapova, Petra Kvitova and Agnieszka Radwanska at the October 23-November 1 tournament.
